name: Leonard & Co's Magical Apothecary and Other Oddities
name_original: Leonard & Co's Magical Apothecary and Other Oddities
description:
Made for GMC Jam #47. The theme was HAZARDOUS ENVIRONMENT. Check out all the entries here:  GMC-Forum.

You start work at Leonard & Co's Magical Apothecary and Other Oddities as an unpaid witch intern. You are tasked with making potions, but you must memorize the instructions before you can add the ingredients. Be careful though... if you mess up you'll cause a workplace hazard!

Jam Team

  • Cloaked Games - Programming and Audio
  • Joseph Ellis - Writing
  • Adrien Weathers - Artwork

Pre Jam

  • Derek Easterday - Music "Museum Jazz"
  • Miscellaneous Essential Code
  • Juju Adams - Scribble

Special thanks to PorcelainDoll and Blake North for bug testing.

EDIT: Special thanks retracted for Blake since he convinced another friend to gaslight me into thinking there was a crash at the credits.
